description_for_human: Free API to get user geolocation by IP address. Returns city, country, coordinates. No API key required.
description_for_model: Use this API to get geolocation data for a user based on their IP address. The API returns city, country (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2), region (ISO 3166-2), latitude, longitude, and Vercel edge region. No authentication required. Make a GET request to /api/geo to get the location of the requesting client.
